note.p: Autograph collector, journalist, and charity manager. Private secretary to Thomas John Barnardo (Dr Barnardo), 1881. Cashier of the Barnardo Homes until his retirement in 1909. Contributor to Notes and Queries for more than thirty years.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/488/72/6); 1891 (RG12/1334/63/6)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 January 2020)
Tower Hamlets Independent and East London Advertiser, 27 February 1909, p. 6
